body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**

If a search attribute's value is null on workflow start, activity start, Nexus start, schedule create, or continue as new, it should not be included on the started item. Today this shouldn't really happen except for rare SDKs doing continue as new (fixing in Go SDK with https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-go/issues/2150).
title: Ignore null search attributes when starting/creating things
